name: Were Our Forefathers Fat? Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which word can you find in HORSEPOWER?
questions.explanation:
owe.

	A car engine's strength and speed is measured in horsepower. For example, an engine with 400 horsepower has power that is equal to that of 400 horses.

questions.text: Which word can you find in WHOLESOME?
questions.explanation:
holes.

	A wholesome meal is a healthy one. This word also contains "who", "so", and "me".

questions.text: Which word can you find in FEARSOME? (A fearsome sight is a scary one.)
questions.explanation:
ear.

	To commit arson means to illegally burn a building on purpose.

questions.text: Which word can you find in HOUSESITTER?
questions.explanation:
use.

	A housesitter is someone who stays in your home while you're away in order to collect the mail, take care of your plants and pets, and do other such jobs. He or she is a sort of babysitter for your house.

questions.text: Which word can you find in UNDERSTANDABLE?
questions.explanation:
able.

	Other words in UNDERSTANDABLE include "under", "and", and "stand".

questions.text: Which word can NOT be made by consecutive letters in HIPPOPOTAMUS?
questions.explanation:
tame.

	The hippopotamus, or hippo, is a fierce African mammal that spends much of its time in water. It is a huge but graceful underwater swimmer, like a giant water ballet dancer.

questions.text: Which word can NOT be made by consecutive letters in BEDRAGGLED? (A bedraggled dog is one that's wet and spattered with mud.)
questions.explanation:
glad.

	Other words in BEDRAGGLED include "be" and "rag".

questions.text: Which word can NOT be made by consecutive letters in REKINDLE? (To rekindle a candle means to light it again.)
questions.explanation:
reek.

	When something reeks it smells bad or too strongly.

questions.text: Which word can NOT be made by consecutive letters in KINDERGARTEN?
questions.explanation:
garden.

	KINDERGARTEN is a German word that means "children's garden".

questions.text: Choose the list of words that CAN be found in the name MISSISSIPPI.
questions.explanation:
Miss, is, sis, sip, pi.

	The name MISSISSIPPI (as in the state of Mississippi or the Mississippi River) has 1 em, 2 peas, 4 eyes, and 4 esses. By the way, pi is the 16th letter of the Greek alphabet. It is also a math word for an number that is a little larger than three.
